WorkItem.Description: It gets to 100% and it stays there - it doesn't show any of the optimizations.  Cancel does not work but the X on the top right does.
WorkItem.Summary: [Optimizer] Optimize doesn't show optimizations after its done

Comments.Message: Have you tried alt-tabbing to find the window?
Having this issue for me as well.  Running on a Mac.  No new window opens, and when I hit the X it doesn't change anything, so I'm guessing it's not working.
Did you just suggest alt-tabbing in Silverlight, Jothay? :)
I missed the big "3" in that statement

Trying to get this one fixed, but I'm not able to repro it. I'm trying on a Mac on Safari... Anyone else experiencing this, please post the browser, and any other pertinent info you can think of to try to help me track this one down.
Using FireFox 3.5.3, just tried in Safari 4.0.3, behaves the same way.  Running Mac OS 10.5.8.  Let me know if there are any other details I can give to help.

I'm also getting this.  There are no other windows, and I disabled the pop-up blocker.  All windows appear to be spawning with silverlight within the same browser window.  I have tried this 3 different ways, running in Safari, Firefox, and as an application.
Silverlight Version 3.0 (3.0.40818.0), 10.6.1 OSX,

One thing I thought of... might be related to the character I'm using.  I load Sariisa of Hyjal (US), add Khadgar's Shoulderpads of Triumph, then select Tools>Optimizer.  I hit Optimize, it runs through, gets to 100%, then stops.  When I try it with Aeron of Ysera (US), it works correcly.  Hope this helps!!

Agree with archangel1701, my alt appears to work, however my main does not. 
Makayez (Frostmane US)  - does not work.
Himeros (Dunemaul US)  - works.
Like archangel, my character (that is experiencing a problem) is a mage.

Same issue in Stand Alone, Firefox and Safari

Optimizer runs to 100% then does nothing. Cancel button does not work (window x closes the optimizer window)


OS X 6.5.1 (Snow Leopard)
hypnotx@perenolde (US)
ALSO A MAGE

The optimizer DOES WORK for a DK Alt on the same server.

Happens to me too, Mac OSX 10.6.2 Safari 4.0.4
On a Mage character (this seems to be a culprit)

Was this combined with another bug report and therefore closed?  It's still happening in live app.
